events.message: The claimant reported a car collision that occurred on April 30th involving their vehicle being hit at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a personal vehicle and collision damage.
An agent was assigned promptly to handle the case, ensuring the customer will receive timely assistance and guidance.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and confirmed that the process will begin immediately.
Our department requested additional documents, including a police report, photos of the damage, and vehicle registration proof.
The claimant submitted the requested police report, detailed photos of the damaged vehicle, and proof of insurance as requested.
Our claims investigation team began examining the details of the collision and reviewing submitted evidence to assess liability.
Investigation completed confirming that the claimant was not at fault and damage estimates align with reported vehicle condition.
A settlement amount was proposed based on the investigation results, covering repairs and related expenses for the claimant's vehicle.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the transparency and speed of the claim handling process after review of the settlement.
Following feedback, the settlement proposal was approved to move forward with the payment and repair process.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued to the claimant's account to cover all approved vehicle repair costs promptly.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that repair work was completed to the claimant's satisfaction.
The documentation and records for this auto accident claim have been archived securely for future reference if required.
